title: API Gateway Migration to v2
description:
Current API gateway is reaching EOL. We need to migrate to v2 with the following considerations:

**Technical Requirements:**
- Maintain backward compatibility for 6 months
- Implement rate limiting per client
- Add OAuth 2.0 support
- Improve error handling and logging

**Business Impact:**
- ~500K requests/day affected
- 12 internal services depend on current gateway
- Mobile app needs SDK update

**Timeline:**
- Architecture review needed by Dec 1st
- Implementation Q1 2026

Architect1 is currently reviewing the proposed architecture and will provide recommendations by end of week.
